thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com | 2 of 114
thread.title: Theresa

author: Theresa
title: Theresa
text:
Love that when I call with a question, you follow up. Needed a different paddle weight, and the customer service person went through and weighed them for us.
And it's wonderful that when I do need to try out a paddle, the indoor court is available (and they are so nice when they have to dig my wild shots out of the racks of equipment). Ordering online is great, and the in store experience is exceptional.
